results.name: a(n) = A000120(A048675(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Antti Karttunen, Data supplement: n, a(n) computed for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
formula: If n is squarefree, then a(n) = A001221(n) = A322862(n).
mathematica: Array[If[# == 1, 0, DigitCount[Total@ Map[#2*2^(PrimePi@ #1 - 1) & @@ # &, FactorInteger[#]], 2, 1]] &, 105]  (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Dec 31 2018 *)
xref: Cf. A002110 (position of the first occurrence of n).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 31 2018
